item.description:
Greetings,

You are invited to the first Boston Area Law of Attraction group meeting. Please join the group and meet with other New England area people who are interested in practicing the science and ideology of The Law of Attraction.

Let's plan for a first meeting on Tuesday, Jan 9, 2007 at 7pm.
I have a central location in downtown Boston and will host our first meeting.

I am looking forward to meeting each of you and exploring these life changing ways of thinking.

Dave

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Law of Attraction January Meetup
